text: lw kharaj almunafiqun maeakum -ayha almwmnwn- lljhad lnshru alaidtirab fi alsufuf walshr walfsad, wlasreu alsayr baynakum balnmymt walbghda', yabghun fitnatakum btthbytkm ean aljhad fi sabil allh, wafikum -ayha almwmnwn- euyun lahum yasmaeun akhbarkm, wynqlwnha 'ilyhm. wallah ealim bhwla' almunafiqin alzalmyn, wsyjazyhm ealaa dhlk
